acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items were microfilmed by the Library of Virginia's Imaging Services Division from a xerox copy of the originals held by the Central Rappahannock Regional Library.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Fredericksburg was established in 1728. Incorporated as a town in 1782, it was incorporated as a city in 1879 and is one of the independent cities of Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Fredericksburg (Va.) Certificates and Registry of Free Negroes in the City of Fredericksburg, 1790-1862, consists of wills, deeds of manumission and emancipation, discharges from servitude, affidavits and certificates of status as a free negro, registrations as free negroes, and a partial register of free negroes with registrations dated 1850-1862 circa. Some of the very first items in the collection are undated. A typed compiled index completed in 1977 preceeds the documents.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: The original documents are located in the papers of the Fredericksburg Circuit Court, Fredericksburg, Virginia.
